name: Fam
headline: Video calling social network to talk with friends and make new friends
description:
Fam is a group video calling social network to talk with your friends and make new friends.

Fam was part of Y-Combinator’s Summer ’17 batch under FriendSpot.

founders.name: Mike McIntyre, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Currently the Co-Founder/CEO of Fam. Fam is a group video calling social network to make new friends with your friends. 

Fam raised its Series A from Founders Fund, and was part of Y-Combinator's S'17 batch. Other notable investors include DST, Pear, NextView, Abstract VC, Scribble Ventures, among others. 

I was previously a Product Manager for Instagram/Facebook in Menlo Park, CA. I worked across several teams including Growth, Search/Ranking, and Social Good (Safety Check/Crisis Response).

generated_description:
### Fam: Connecting Friends Through Video

**Overview**  
Founded in 2017 and based in New York, Fam is a social networking app designed specifically for group video calling. Initially launched under the name FriendSpot as part of Y Combinator's Summer 2017 batch, Fam aims to create a space where people can connect with their friends, as well as make new ones.

**Mission**  
Fam's mission is simple: transform the way we communicate through video by fostering friendships. The app allows users to engage in group calls, which facilitates meaningful conversations and connections.

**Team and Partnerships**  
With a compact team of 11 employees, Fam is guided by its partner, nan. This lean structure allows them to stay agile and focused on refining the user experience.

**Features and Accessibility**  
Fam not only encourages lively interactions among friends but also emphasizes safety and privacy—a crucial aspect of any social network today. Users can download the Fam app on iOS devices and access essential information like Terms of Service and Privacy Policy on their website.

Fam's digital presence doesn’t end with the app. They're active on platforms like TikTok and Instagram, reaching out to a broader audience and fostering a community.

**The Takeaway**  
Fam is positioned at the intersection of technology and social interaction, making it easier for us to stay connected in a world that increasingly values digital communication. If you’re looking for a fun way to interact with friends, Fam could very well be where your new social experiences begin. 

For more details, you can visit their website at [Fam App](https://www.famapp.com).
